title: James Harden, NFL ratings, Andy Reid, playoffs, and social media
itunes:title: James Harden, NFL ratings, Andy Reid, playoffs, and social media
description:
Colin explains why Houston Rockets SG James Harden is overrated, why the NFL ratings are up, reasons why Kansas City Chiefs HC Andy Reid is underrated, his NFL wild card predictions, and why it's wise to stay off social media. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Kevin Clark, Greg Jennings, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
